name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Screenshot - One Click Screenshot (Current and Full Page)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a screenshot of the current page and full page and save it to downloads in just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"One Screenshot" is a Google Chrome extension that allows you to capture a screenshot of the current web page with just one click. This handy tool integrates seamlessly into your browser, providing a quick and efficient way to capture the content you see on your screen. With "One Screenshot," there's no need to navigate through complex menus or use external software. Simply click on the extension's icon, and it will instantly capture a screenshot of the entire visible portion of the current page.

What's New?
- Full page screenshot added
- New look
